node.title: 'Let's Go Brandon' is all over US politics. The real meaning is not as innocent as it seems
node.alt: A sign reading "Let's go Brandon" is displayed on the railing in the first half of an NCAA college football game
node.description: It's on T-shirts. People yell it at political rallies. Politicians wear masks with the slogan. So what does US politics latest phrase, 'Let's Go Brandon', actually mean?
node.content:
["You can find it on T-shirts. It's chanted by people at political rallies. Republican politicians wear masks with the phrase. Leading Republicans share photos of it on construction sites.", "The seemingly innocuous chant is becoming an increasingly common part\u00a0of American politics. Here's what it means, and how it came about", "
What does 'Let's Go Brandon' mean?
", "We won't be around the bush, \u2014 it actually means \"F*** Joe Biden\".", "Think of it a bit like a secret handshake for American conservatives, but it's not\u00a0that secret. It's an in-joke, a wink and a nod for elected politicians and supporters to share and\u00a0say \"hey, I'm a part of the team\".", "And you can put it on a mask, say it out loud or put it on a yard sign and not have your neighbours come knocking to complain or get tossed out of your local cafe for swearing.", "Just like \"Lock Her Up\" in 2016, \"Let's Go Brandon\" has taken root in an age of politics where memes often matter more than policies.", "
It started with NASCAR
", "In early October, at a NASCAR race at the Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama,\u00a0Brandon Brown\u00a0had won his first Xfinity Series and was being interviewed by an NBC Sports reporter.", "The crowd behind the 28-year-old was chanting something at first difficult to make out.\u00a0", "The reporter suggested they were chanting \"Let's go, Brandon\" to cheer the driver. But it became increasingly clear they were saying: \"F---\u00a0Joe Biden.\"", "Here's the clip. Fair warning for some coarse language, obviously.", "The clip took off online, and the \"Let's Go Brandon\" meme was born.", "NASCAR and NBC have since taken steps to limit \"ambient crowd noise\" during interviews.", "
It's appeared in a bunch of places since
", "When\u00a0President Biden visited a construction site in suburban Chicago a few weeks ago to promote his vaccinate-or-test mandate, protesters deployed both the \"Brandon\" version and the non-coded version of the chant. Last week,\u00a0Biden's motorcade was driving past a \"Let's Go Brandon\" banner as the President passed through Plainfield, New Jersey.", "A group chanted \"Let's go, Brandon\" outside a Virginia park when Biden made an appearance on behalf of the Democratic candidate for governor, Terry McAuliffe.", "On a Southwest flight from Houston to Albuquerque, the pilot signed off his greeting over the public address system with the phrase, to audible gasps from some passengers.", "Southwest said in a statement that the airline \"takes pride in providing a welcoming, comfortable, and respectful environment\" and that \"behaviour from any individual that is divisive or offensive is not condoned.\"", "Veteran Republican ad maker Jim Innocenzi\u00a0 told the Associated Press he had no qualms about the coded crudity, calling it \"hilarious.\"", "\"Unless you are living in a cave, you know what it means,\" he said.", "
And of course, the former president has found a way to make a buck off it
", "As the creator and distributor of conservative memes through his now-banned Twitter account for years, Donald Trump has a keen eye for what will catch on with his supporters.", "He was quick to jump on the 'Let's Go Brandon' craze, and has blasted his supporters with text messages hoping to fundraise off the moment.", "One message to supporters reads, \"#FJB or LET'S GO BRANDON? Either way, President Trump wants YOU to have our ICONIC new shirt.\"", "That \"FREE SHIRT\" being promised only comes with\u00a0a minimum $US45 ($60) donation (and the website suggests a $250 donation with a little animation. Boxes\u00a0to make the donation recurring every month, and to make an additional donation are already pre-checked).", "The donations go towards the Save America PAC, essentially Trump's fundraising arm while he's not officially running for office.", "
It's not the first time a president has copped abuse
", "And it won't be the last.", "", "
Donald Trump copped plenty during his term in office, like all US presidents.(Reuters: Mark Makela)
", "While in office, Trump was subjected to as many mean nicknames as he dished out. Parody children's\u00a0books were written making fun of him. Comedians issued apologies for photo shoots holding a prop of his bloody, severed head. \"F***\u00a0Trump\" graffiti still marks many an overpass in Washington, DC.\u00a0", "George W\u00a0Bush had a shoe thrown in his face. Bill Clinton was criticised so frequently, his most vocal critics were labelled the \"Clinton crazies.\"\u00a0Grover Cleveland faced chants of \"Ma, Ma Where's my Pa?\" in the 1880s over rumours he'd fathered an illegitimate child. Thomas Jefferson and Andrew Jackson were the subject of poems that leaned into racist tropes and allegations of bigamy.", "So making fun of the president, especially if you didn't vote for them, isn't a new phenomenon in American politics.", "Matthew Delmont, a history professor at Dartmouth College, said that the big difference between the abuse then and now was the expansion of social media.", "
About the only person this isn't good for? The real Brandon
", "The\u00a0win that led to the interview that sparked the meme was his first career victory.", "His team is underfunded, short-staffed and owned by his father.", "The team has long struggled for sponsorship and existing partners have not been marketing the driver since the slogan took off."]
